name: website-heatmap-tool
description: Enterprise-grade website heatmap and user behavior analytics platform

scripts.dev:backend: concurrently "npm run dev:event-collection" "npm run dev:analytics" "npm run dev:heatmap" "npm run dev:user-mgmt" "npm run dev:privacy" "npm run dev:ai-insights"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:sdk
scripts.build:services: concurrently "cd backend/event-collection && npm run build" "cd backend/analytics-processing && npm run build" "cd backend/heatmap-generation && npm run build" "cd backend/user-management && npm run build" "cd backend/privacy-service && npm run build" "cd backend/ai-insights && npm run build"
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:sdk
scripts.test:services: concurrently "cd backend/event-collection && npm test" "cd backend/analytics-processing && npm test" "cd backend/heatmap-generation && npm test" "cd backend/user-management && npm test" "cd backend/privacy-service && npm test" "cd backend/ai-insights && npm test"
scripts.test:all: npm test && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:sdk
scripts.lint:services: concurrently "cd backend/event-collection && npm run lint" "cd backend/analytics-processing && npm run lint" "cd backend/heatmap-generation && npm run lint" "cd backend/user-management && npm run lint" "cd backend/privacy-service && npm run lint" "cd backend/ai-insights && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:frontend -- --fix && npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:sdk -- --fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:sdk
scripts.type-check:services: concurrently "cd backend/event-collection && npm run type-check" "cd backend/analytics-processing && npm run type-check" "cd backend/heatmap-generation && npm run type-check" "cd backend/user-management && npm run type-check" "cd backend/privacy-service && npm run type-check" "cd backend/ai-insights && npm run type-check"
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:sdk && npm run setup:tests
scripts.setup:services: cd backend/event-collection && npm install && cd ../analytics-processing && npm install && cd ../heatmap-generation && npm install && cd ../user-management && npm install && cd ../privacy-service && npm install && cd ../ai-insights && npm install
scripts.setup:tests: cd tests/integration && npm install && cd ../e2e && npm install && cd ../performance && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:sdk
scripts.clean:services: cd backend/event-collection && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../analytics-processing && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../heatmap-generation && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../user-management && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../privacy-service && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../ai-insights && rm -rf dist node_modules
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:api && npm run docs:guides
scripts.migrate:up: cd backend/user-management && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.migrate:down: cd backend/user-management && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.seed: cd backend/user-management && npx prisma db seed
